uhc.commands.error.noteam: You can only run this command if you are alive and in a team!
uhc.lobby.ready.question: ¿Está tu equipo listo?
uhc.advancements.root.desc: Advancements to achieve during the UHC!
uhc.advancements.firstBlood.desc: Kill the first person of the game
uhc.advancements.earlyExit.desc: Someone had to go out first ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
uhc.advancements.mostlyHarmless.desc: Lest damage dealt to other players
uhc.advancements.heavyHitter.desc: Most damage dealt to other players
uhc.advancements.combatLogger.desc: We all believe it was your internet...
uhc.advancements.parkourMaster.desc: Complete the parkour in the lobby
uhc.advancements.worldRecordPace.desc: Be the first to craft a crafting table
uhc.advancements.thatsEmbarrassing.desc: Take damage from a sweet berry bush
uhc.advancements.busted.desc: Break the rules by using flexible block placement
uhc.advancements.demolitionExpert.desc: Are you sure you know what you're doing with that?
uhc.advancements.brokenAnkles.desc: Take fall damage within a minute of UHC starting
uhc.advancements.onTheEdge.desc: Surviving 60 seconds on half a heart
uhc.advancements.notNow.desc: Sensei's words echoed... There's a time and a place for everything, but not now.
uhc.advancements.officiallyBored.desc: Beat Minesweeper in less than 40 seconds
uhc.advancements.findTheButton.desc: Follow the clues in the lobby to find the button
uhc.advancements.uhOh.desc: Oops, I forgot to add barriers!
uhc.advancements.easterEggHunter.desc: Find all the hidden easter eggs in the lobby
uhc.advancements.easterEggHunter.found: You've found %s out of %s easter eggs
uhc.minesweeper.desc.2: Left click to reveal a tile
uhc.minesweeper.desc.3: Right click to reveal a flag
uhc.minesweeper.desc.4: There are a total of 12 mines
uhc.minesweeper.record: %s now holds the record beating Minesweeper in %s seconds
uhc.game.grace.first: The grace period will last 10 minutes. Once it is over PVP will be enabled and the World Border will start moving
uhc.game.grace.generic: The grace period will end in %s minutes
uhc.game.grace.over: The grace period is now over. PVP is enabled and the World Border has started moving! Good Luck!
uhc.game.addedToTeam: You have been added to team %s
uhc.spectator.notDead: You need to be dead to spectate!
uhc.tips.coords: You can enabled or disable the coordinate HUD by using the /coords command
uhc.tips.glow: You can enabled or disable teammate glow by using the /teamgglow command
uhc.tips.fullbright: You can enable or disable fullbright by using the /fullbright command
uhc.tips.rules: Remember to refresh yourself with the rules which can be found on the discord server!
uhc.tips.worldBorder: Don't forget to check the world border!
